1.0.name: wordpress/zotpress
1.0.description:
Zotpress brings scholarly blogging to WordPress. This plugin displays your Zotero citations on your WordPress blog. Zotero is a free, cross-platform reference manager that integrates with your browser and word processor.

Features

  • Display your Zotero citations on your blog using in-text citations and bibliographies
  • Display citations, collections, or tags
  • Selective CSS styling via IDs and classes
  • Supports both user and group Zotero accounts
  • Add thumbnail images to your citations
  • Let visitors cite and download your publications
  • And more!

Compatible with Firefox, Safari, Chrome, IE7, IE8, and IE9. Made with jQuery, jQuery UI, and qTip 2.

Special thanks to Christopher Cheung and Jason S. for their coding support and a

4.4.1.name: wordpress/zotpress
4.4.1.description:
Zotpress brings scholarly blogging to WordPress. This plugin displays your Zotero citations on your WordPress blog. Zotero is a free, cross-platform reference manager that integrates with your browser and word processor.

Features

  • Display your Zotero citations on your blog using in-text citations and bibliographies
  • Display citations, collections, or tags
  • Selective CSS styling via IDs and classes
  • Supports both user and group Zotero accounts
  • Add thumbnail images to your citations
  • Let visitors cite and download your publications
  • And more!

Compatible with Firefox, Safari, Chrome, IE7, IE8, and IE9. Made with jQuery, jQuery UI, and qTip 2.

Special thanks to Christopher Cheung and Jason S. for their coding support and a
